Title: Picture Perfect
Plot: Mickey Bricks and his team of con artists decide to dabble in the world of art this week, when they set up an elaborate scam to swindle a greedy gallery owner, by faking an early Mondrian painting.
GuestStars: David Spinx, Graham Pountney, Rashid Karapiet, Laura Girling, Roger Blake, Brian Pettifer, Kate Miles, Orla Brady, Valentine Pelka
